verses.verse: In the year <S%H8141><s%> that king <S%H4428><s%> Uzziah <S%H5818><s%> died <S%H4194><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> also <S%H853><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> sitting <S%H3427><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> a throne, <S%H3678><s%> high <S%H7311><s%> and lifted up, <S%H5375><s%> and his train <S%H7757><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> the temple. <S%H1964><s%>

Above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> it stood <S%H5975><s%> the seraphims: <S%H8314><s%> each one <S%H259><s%> had six wings <S%H8337><s%> <S%H3671><s%> <S%H8337><s%> <S%H3671><s%> with twain <S%H8147><s%> he covered <S%H3680><s%> his face, <S%H6440><s%> and with twain <S%H8147><s%> he covered <S%H3680><s%> his feet, <S%H7272><s%> and with twain <S%H8147><s%> he did fly. <S%H5774><s%>

And one cried <S%H7121><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> <S%H2088><s%> another, <S%H2088><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Holy, <S%H6918><s%> holy, <S%H6918><s%> holy, <S%H6918><s%> is the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts: <S%H6635><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4393><s%> of his glory. <S%H3519><s%>

And the posts <S%H520><s%> of the door <S%H5592><s%> moved <S%H5128><s%> at the voice <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6963><s%> of him that cried, <S%H7121><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with smoke. <S%H6227><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> I, Woe <S%H188><s%> is me! for <S%H3588><s%> I am undone; <S%H1820><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am a man <S%H376><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> lips, <S%H8193><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of a people <S%H5971><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> lips: <S%H8193><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the King, <S%H4428><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

Then flew <S%H5774><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the seraphims <S%H8314><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, having a live coal <S%H7531><s%> in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> which he had taken <S%H3947><s%> with the tongs <S%H4457><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the altar: <S%H4196><s%>

And he laid <S%H5060><s%> it upon <S%H5921><s%> my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Lo, <S%H2009><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> hath touched <S%H5060><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thy lips; <S%H8193><s%> and thine iniquity <S%H5771><s%> is taken away, <S%H5493><s%> and thy sin <S%H2403><s%> purged. <S%H3722><s%>

Also I heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord, <S%H136><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H853><s%> Whom <S%H4310><s%> shall I send, <S%H7971><s%> and who <S%H4310><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> for us? Then said <S%H559><s%> I, Here am I; <S%H2009><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> me.

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Go, <S%H1980><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> Hear ye indeed, <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8085><s%> but understand <S%H995><s%> not; <S%H408><s%> and see ye indeed, <S%H7200><s%> <S%H7200><s%> but perceive <S%H3045><s%> not. <S%H3808><s%>

Make the heart <S%H3820><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> fat, <S%H8082><s%> and make their ears <S%H241><s%> heavy, <S%H3513><s%> and shut <S%H8173><s%> their eyes; <S%H5869><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> they see <S%H7200><s%> with their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> with their ears, <S%H241><s%> and understand <S%H995><s%> with their heart, <S%H3824><s%> and convert, <S%H7725><s%> and be healed. <S%H7495><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> I, Lord, <S%H136><s%> how long? <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> And he answered, <S%H559><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> be wasted <S%H7582><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H369><s%> inhabitant, <S%H3427><s%> and the houses <S%H1004><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H369><s%> man, <S%H120><s%> and the land <S%H127><s%> be utterly <S%H8077><s%> desolate, <S%H7582><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have removed men far away, <S%H7368><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H120><s%> and there be a great <S%H7227><s%> forsaking <S%H5805><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

But yet <S%H5750><s%> in it shall be a tenth, <S%H6224><s%> and it shall return, <S%H7725><s%> and shall be <S%H1961><s%> eaten: <S%H1197><s%> as a teil tree, <S%H424><s%> and as an oak, <S%H437><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> substance <S%H4678><s%> is in them, when they cast <S%H7995><s%> their leaves: so the holy <S%H6944><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be the substance <S%H4678><s%> thereof.
